# reloadItems(withIdentifiers:)

**Instance Method**

Reloads the data within the specified items in the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func reloadItems(withIdentifiers identifiers: [Any])
```

## Parameters

- **identifiers**: The array of identifiers corresponding to the items to reload in the snapshot.

## Reloading data

- **reloadSections(withIdentifiers:)**: Reloads the data within the specified sections of the snapshot.

items.description: Reloads the data within the specified sections of the snapshot.
items.name: reloadSections(withIdentifiers:)
